name: Sayori Shoots Up The Literature Club
summary: Have you ever wondered what would happen if instead of committing suicide Sayori shot up the school instead?Of course you have! Lucky for you, you don't have to wait any longer because this mod offers just that. Watch as Sayori blows away the club members with her new poem, a sawed off shotgun, and prepare for a good time with a mod that finally has the 3 Gs of fun: girls, giggles, and guns.
